content: in mind that the ribbed hem will add 2 / 5 cm please note that adding length will affect yardage requirements all sizes after the last stripe with cc switch to mc and knit 1 round before beginning ribbing work 1x1 twisted rib for 2 / 5 cm bind off in pattern sleeves sizes 1 and 2 transfer 60 sleeve sts from stitch holder or waste yarn to main gauge needle with rs facing join mc at right side of underarm and pick up first 5 stitches from underarm cast-on place bor marker pick up 5 more stitches from underarm cast-on knit 60 held sts knit 5 stitches picked up from cast-on to arrive back at the bor marker 70 sts sizes 3 and 4 transfer 60 sleeve sts from stitch holder or waste yarn to main gauge needle with rs facing join mc at right side of underarm and pick up first 10 stitches from underarm cast-on place bor marker pick up 10 more stitches from underarm cast-on knit 60 held sts knit 10 stitches picked up from cast-on to arrive back at the bor marker 80 sts size 5 and 6 transfer 70 sleeve sts from stitch holder or waste yarn to main gauge needle with rs facing join mc at right side of underarm and pick up first 10 stitches from underarm cast-on place bor marker pick up 10 more stitches from underarm cast-on knit 70 held sts knit 10 stitches picked up from cast-on to arrive back at the bor marker 90 sts size 7 transfer 80 sleeve sts from stitch holder or waste yarn to main gauge needle with rs facing join mc at right side of underarm and pick up first 10 stitches from underarm cast-on place bor marker pick up 10 more stitches from underarm cast-on knit 80 held sts knit 10 stitches picked up from cast-on to arrive back at the bor marker 100 sts knit 89 89 95 95 99 99 107 rnds -
